org.maxgamer.quickshop.Economy

Interface EconomyCore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Economy, Economy_Reserve, Economy_Vault

    public interface EconomyCore
    Author:
    netherfoam Represents an economy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deposit(UUID name, double amount)
      Deposits a given amount of money from thin air to the given username.
      String format(double balance)
      Formats the given number...
      double getBalance(UUID name)
      Fetches the balance of the given account name
      boolean isValid()
      Checks that this economy is valid.
      boolean transfer(UUID from, UUID to, double amount)
      Transfers the given amount of money from Player1 to Player2
      boolean withdraw(UUID name, double amount)
      Withdraws a given amount of money from the given username and turns it to thin air.

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        boolean deposit(UUID name,
                double amount)
        Deposits a given amount of money from thin air to the given username.
        Parameters:
        name - The exact (case insensitive) username to give money to
        amount - The amount to give them
        Returns:
        True if success (Should be almost always)

      • format

        String format(double balance)
        Formats the given number... E.g. 50.5 becomes $50.5 Dollars, or 50 Dollars 5 Cents
        Parameters:
        balance - The given number
        Returns:
        The balance in human readable text.

      • getBalance

        double getBalance(UUID name)
        Fetches the balance of the given account name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the account
        Returns:
        Their current balance.

      • transfer

        boolean transfer(UUID from,
                 UUID to,
                 double amount)
        Transfers the given amount of money from Player1 to Player2
        Parameters:
        from - The player who is paying money
        to - The player who is receiving money
        amount - The amount to transfer
        Returns:
        true if success (Payer had enough cash, receiver was able to receive the funds)

      • withdraw

        boolean withdraw(UUID name,
                 double amount)
        Withdraws a given amount of money from the given username and turns it to thin air.
        Parameters:
        name - The exact (case insensitive) username to take money from
        amount - The amount to take from them
        Returns:
        True if success, false if they didn't have enough cash

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks that this economy is valid. Returns false if it is not valid.
        Returns:
        True if this economy will work, false if it will not.
